name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Service Engineer with extensive experience in Electrical Maintenance and Building Services, I am skilled in HVAC systems, Electrical Wiring, and basic Plumbing. I possess certifications including the 18th Edition Certificate, C&G Level 2 & 3 Diplomas in Electrical Installation, as well as C&G 2360 Parts 1 & 2 and C&G 2391, ensuring compliance with Health & Safety Regulations. I effectively handle Reactive Maintenance and PPM tasks while prioritizing exceptional communication and team collaboration skills. My hands-on approach and adaptability allow me to excel in problem-solving and time management, delivering top-notch service in fast-paced environments.
